EmailTemplate.description: This template can be used J Frame distributor communications.
EmailTemplate.name: J Frame Distributor Communication
EmailTemplate.subject: Sauer-Danfoss J Frame Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please find attached a document containing information regarding the Series 45 J Frame product.
For more information, please contact your Sauer-Danfoss Account Manager.
Best regards, Sauer-Danfoss, Inc. (US) 2800 East 13th Street, Ames, IA 50010
